name: Days Unknown
description:
A proof of concept made for the Narrative Design unit in first year. This is deliberately experimental and a game that might not be for everyone, but I'm sharing it here for anyone who might be interested in playing it.

Please note that this is not perfect. The choice branch at the end has a window that might not always reflect the amount of times you've blinked or every possible timing variation.

I spent an ungodly amount of time testing this, trying to get everything perfect and even redid the script handling the branches and responses from scratch. But by the end of the five weeks, this had reached a state where I was satisfied with it and that it was finished enough to release.

Days Unknown refers to the central theme of time and disjointed experiences. This is the first entry in a series of personal projects that I'm planning to develop and release for free.

Thank you for checking this out and feel free to share your thoughts and feedback below!
